public abstract class CayenneTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task

A superclass of Cayenne Ant tasks. Performs some common setup

Method Detail

configureLogging

protected void configureLogging()
Sets up logging to be in line with the Ant logging system. It should be called by subclasses from the "execute" method.
